  <div class="topic p-responsive container-lg">
    <div class="d-md-flex gutter-md">
      <div class="col-md-8 col-lg-9">
          <div class="border rounded-1 box-shadow bg-white p-4 mb-5">
    <div class="float-sm-right ml-sm-4 mb-4 text-center">
      <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/github/explore/80688e429a7d4ef2fca1e82350fe8e3517d3494d/topics/javascript/javascript.png" width="100" height="100" alt="javascript logo">
    </div>

  <div class="markdown-body f5 mb-2">
    <p>JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight interpreted or JIT-compiled programming language with first-class functions. While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, many non-browser environments also use it, such as Node.js, Apache CouchDB and Adobe Acrobat. JavaScript is a prototype-based, multi-paradigm, dynamic language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and declarative (e.g. functional programming) styles.</p>
  </div>
</div>

                  <p>I noticed that <a class="user-mention" data-hovercard-type="user" data-hovercard-url="/users/NitronR/hovercard" data-octo-click="hovercard-link-click" data-octo-dimensions="link_type:self" href="https://github.com/NitronR">@NitronR</a> has added a ton of content to mostly the rosetta code section (thanks BTW). I did forum search for a couple of the challenges and it looks like guide pages have been created, but I noticed that the <code>forumTopicId</code> wasn't added to many of the chall</p>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/11126" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:567186155,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="94f88c6fd2fea3f1efda05506793e74b5172be6161aea46f5767e3909bb9837b" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Allow BigInt usage in templates
</a>

            </h1>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="YanDevDe"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/1526048?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  YanDevDe
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-02-18T22:03:12Z" class="no-wrap">Feb 18, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <h3>What problem does this feature solve?</h3>
<p>It would allow us to use numbers which is larger than MAX_SAFE_INTEGER.</p>
<h3>What does the proposed API look like?</h3>
<p>In HTML, <code>{{BigInt("100")}}</code>, <code>{{100n}}</code>, <code>{{2n * 50n}}</code> or <code>{{50n + 50n}}</code> should show "100" (it can be just simply string by using .toString()) at frontend.<br>
At the moment using BigInt in "Mustache" syntax just throw error.<br>
Sure, backu</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>React extension version: 4.4.0</p>
<h2>Steps To Reproduce</h2>
<ol>
<li>Install Firefox 72.0.2x64</li>
<li>Go to Discordapp.com</li>
</ol>
<h2>The current behavior</h2>
<p>Extension reports: <em>"This page does not appears to be using React"</em></p>
<h2>The expected behavior</h2>
<p>React is detected (just like it is currently in Chrome/Chromium)</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:561568354,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="b26d0e3d06f190d4b7aaf745be3f7b1125991895faa266322a69465976aa7305" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/17997">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>In <a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="583264375" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/issues/30414" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/twbs/bootstrap/pull/30414/hovercard" href="https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/pull/30414">twbs/bootstrap#30414</a> we discovered the skip links do not look that well if backported to <code>v4</code>:<br>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11559216/78049364-455b3b80-737b-11ea-86ca-e4e7d9a0c93f.png"><img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11559216/78049364-455b3b80-737b-11ea-86ca-e4e7d9a0c93f.png" alt="image" style="max-width:100%;"></a></p>
<p>We could also improve the theming in v5, in some viewports, it also covers a critical part of the navbar<br>
![image](<a href="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/115592" rel="nofollow">https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/115592</a></p>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/getify/You-Dont-Know-JS/issues/1482" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:465448095,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="decbce11dd226b7dfcf305b33433a471cb7ff78732fc2c2482c8e4419625cf6a" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                &quot;types &amp; grammar&quot;: no more &quot;early ReferenceError&quot;
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="getify"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/150330?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  getify
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-07-08T20:35:45Z" class="no-wrap">Jul 8, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Update various parts of the text.</p>
<p>There's no such thing as "early ReferenceError" anymore (for things like <code>0++</code>); they're all just "early SyntaxError" now. <a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="176899403" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/issues/691" data-hovercard-type="issue" data-hovercard-url="/tc39/ecma262/issues/691/hovercard" href="https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/issues/691">tc39/ecma262#691</a></p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:465448095,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="6ad6a13ab8dbf92a09f36ed8bbb19e6a21adb42cceb0f6538034b1fbf392ee88" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/getify/You-Dont-Know-JS/issues/1482">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                Non-Enforced Rules Should be Clearly Documented in the README.md

            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  Zamiell
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-07T00:57:48Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 6, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <ol>
<li>The users of this style guide will probably expect that all of the rules that it prescribes will be enforced by eslint. However, this is not the case - there is a secret, non-documented segmentation where some rules are enforced and others are not, because they would be "too noisy on a legacy codebase". An example of a problematic rule like this is covered in issue #2020. I propose that all of</li>
</ol>

                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-02-08T19:29:06Z" class="no-wrap">Feb 8, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Is there a way to hide the icon of a <code>BrowserWindow</code> on Windows?</p>
<p><strong>Expected:</strong><br>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/438516/74090908-1ce34f00-4a66-11ea-81ee-d2a89ed4a11e.png"><img width="142" alt="Screen Shot 2020-02-08 at 11 28 08 AM" src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/438516/74090908-1ce34f00-4a66-11ea-81ee-d2a89ed4a11e.png" style="max-width:100%;"></a></p>
<p><strong>Actual:</strong><br>
&lt;img width="68" alt="Screen Shot 2020-02-08 at 11 27 35 AM" src="<a href="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/438516/74090907-194fc800-4a" rel="nofollow">https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/438516/74090907-194fc800-4a</a></p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:562066480,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="af3a93f3d4cbb888ef48e5dda480111601194211d9a496ce4dd411d874ebde9e" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/electron/electron/issues/22105">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/trekhleb/javascript-algorithms/issues/339" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:433366528,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="010ada834811b4c7355c9b54a38390839032583b2595a7307b3b79187ca215af" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Cartesian product with an empty set should be an empty set
</a>

            </h1>

              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  GrosSacASac
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-04-15T16:12:26Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 15, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p><a href="https://github.com/trekhleb/javascript-algorithms/blob/master/src/algorithms/sets/cartesian-product/cartesianProduct.js#L8">https://github.com/trekhleb/javascript-algorithms/blob/master/src/algorithms/sets/cartesian-product/cartesianProduct.js#L8</a></p>
<p>I think it makes more sense to return an empty array</p>
<pre><code>// invalid input return null or throw an error
if (!setA || !setB) {
    return null;
}
if (!setA.length || !setB.length) {
    return []; 
}
// or do nothing since the for loop will not trigger anyway
</code></pre>

                  <ul>
<li><strong>Version</strong>: v10.x</li>
<li><strong>Platform</strong>: all</li>
<li><strong>Subsystem</strong>: repl</li>

<h3>What steps will reproduce the bug?</h3>
<pre><code>$ node
&gt; function foo() {
... let n = 10n;
Thrown:
let n = 10n;
           ^

SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input
&gt;
</code></pre>
<h3>How often does it reproduce? Is there a required condition?</h3>
<p>Reproduces all the time.</p>
<h3>What is the expected behavior?</h3>
<p>Should not cause an</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/denoland/deno/issues/4779" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:601178053,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="8d90eaa00f429ba40b3c172d1cb8599428660da1bf7ec7f39717090110af0db1" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Add &quot;fork&quot; method to DenoPermissions
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

              10
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="bartlomieju"
              src="https://avatars3.githubusercontent.com/u/13602871?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  bartlomieju
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-16T15:39:34Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 16, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>To have <code>Deno</code> namespace in the worker, we'll want to provide a map of permissions worker should have. Worker's set of permissions mustn't escalate permissions of parent worker/Deno process.</p>
<p>To achieve that a method called <code>fork</code> should be added to <code>DenoPermissions</code> struct. <code>fork</code> would take as many parameters as there are fields on <code>DenoPermissions</code> and return new <code>DenoPermissions</code> instance a</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:601178053,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="ef5592d8e21d32f4513eb52af06d9e2778bd67cfbfb38b994540a1fd2446bd1b" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/denoland/deno/issues/4779">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

                <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto h5 lh-condensed">

              </div>

                <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
                  <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

                  6
                </div>
            </article>

              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/issues/18680" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:567991835,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="1e4c999a91e2a76ae2963380a7c7b127196e88f799d0a0c55df6dfc66c4b7a47" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <h5>Description of the problem</h5>
<p>It seems lack of some properties in <code>MeshPhysicalMaterial</code> document.</p>
<p><a href="https://threejs.org/docs/#api/en/materials/MeshPhysicalMaterial" rel="nofollow">https://threejs.org/docs/#api/en/materials/MeshPhysicalMaterial</a></p>
<p>Ever what I noticed are</p>
<ul>
<li>clearcoatNormalScale</li>
<li>clearcoatNormalMap</li>
<li>sheen</li>
<li>transparency</li>
</ul>
<p>We should update.</p>
<h5>Three.js version</h5>
<ul class="contains-task-list">
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" checked=""> Dev</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox"> r113</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox"> ...</li>
</ul>
<h5>Browser</h5>
<ul class="contains-task-list">
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" checked=""> All of them</li>
<li>[ ]</li>
</ul>

                  <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

                  6
                </div>
            </article>

      <article class="p-3">

                  <p><a href="https://material-ui.com/components/menus/#simple-menu" rel="nofollow">https://material-ui.com/components/menus/#simple-menu</a> states:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Simple menus open over the anchor element by default (this option can be changed via props).</p>
</blockquote>
<p><strong>How</strong> can this be changed via props? The page doesn't say. I went to the <a href="https://material-ui.com/api/menu/" rel="nofollow">Menu API page</a>, and I don't see anything simple like <code>open: 'below'</code>, or an offset.</p>
<p>Developers have been struggling to figu</p>

              <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm " href="/mui-org/material-ui/contribute" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CONTRIBUTE_PAGE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;CLICK_VISUAL_REPRESENTATION_UNKNOWN&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:23083156,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="1eea5298e022ddc2a3211ed0b1bf4ebdc7cf6b38a42a346ec07e892c862a4a25" data-ga-click="Explore, go to repository contribute, location:good first issues; text:more good first issues;">
                Find more good first issues <span class="Bump-link-symbol">â</span>
</a>

            </div>
        </div>
  </div>
</article>

                <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto h5 lh-condensed">
                  <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/webpack/webpack/issues/10771" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;LITTLE_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:606395055,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="954458d9a54fe685674ba8322d1c26e7e509bb848e807a2affac4e433bf08d70" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:small;">
                    module.unsafeCache is undocumented and causes unexpected errors
</a>

                </h1>
              </div>

            </article>

            <div class="mt-3">
              <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm " href="/webpack/webpack/contribute" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CONTRIBUTE_PAGE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;CLICK_VISUAL_REPRESENTATION_UNKNOWN&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:3678731,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="d5c200083eea05bc012ad624bd03c806fffe23fb40d847013dde26d39e68115c" data-ga-click="Explore, go to repository contribute, location:good first issues; text:more good first issues;">
                Find more good first issues <span class="Bump-link-symbol">â</span>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/chartjs/Chart.js/issues/7299" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:609441510,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="cad84db719e962aa08c41449da14db3e2680ef9dd7cba3c24c38c685b6fa9e45" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-29T23:44:11Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 29, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Documentation Is:</p>

<ul class="contains-task-list">
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" checked=""> Missing or needed</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox"> Confusing</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox"> Not Sure?</li>
</ul>
<h3>Please Explain in Detail...</h3>
<p>I needed to produce a number of charts with a consistent yAxes logarithmic scale so that users can compare between charts.</p>
<p>I tried setting the same yAxes config settings for each chart:</p>
<pre><code>beginAtZero: true
ticks
</code></pre>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

                <relative-time datetime="2019-12-24T21:25:57Z" class="no-wrap">Dec 24, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I tried to follow the initial steps from here: <a href="https://www.learnstorybook.com/intro-to-storybook/react/en/get-started/" rel="nofollow">https://www.learnstorybook.com/intro-to-storybook/react/en/get-started/</a></p>
<p>running:</p>
<pre><code>npx create-react-app taskbox
cd taskbox
</code></pre>
<p>Then when I ran:<br>
<code>npx -p @storybook/cli sb init</code></p>
<p>I get the error  <code>TypeError: Cannot set property 'storybook' of undefined</code></p>
<p>This is the full message in my terminal:</p>
<pre><code> sb init - the simplest way to add a
</code></pre>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/expressjs/express/issues/3062" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:172649335,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="ed599c2800185dc5ed1decf5021391b54e40023442d524eeeb744d98a6c52693" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Debug namespace is not microservices (SOA) oriented
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

              5
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="rafis"
              src="https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/3502395?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  rafis
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2016-08-23T09:14:56Z" class="no-wrap">Aug 23, 2016</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Express uses hardcoded values for debug namespace, for example:<br>
<a href="https://github.com/expressjs/express/blob/b69b7605b07b41273acc931d25ab585377bcd107/lib/router/index.js#L20">https://github.com/expressjs/express/blob/b69b7605b07b41273acc931d25ab585377bcd107/lib/router/index.js#L20</a></p>
<p>and it is extremly hard to determine in output where things are happening while doing TDD on microservices architecture. It would be nice to allow to specify prefix for namespace, i.e. per microservice which is an express app.</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/goldbergyoni/nodebestpractices/issues/620" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:555163924,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/javascript&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="6274ed8c556d2e3966b11a4e2b71e092d54c07b0fd6cc7e1d9c247584b2cc166" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">

          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="goldbergyoni"
              src="https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/8571500?v=4"

          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  goldbergyoni
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-01-26T01:31:30Z" class="no-wrap">Jan 25, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Given the immense popularity of Docker and the need to harden it different per platform (see ideas below) - we'd like to start writing a Docker best practices section.</p>
<p>You're welcome to contribute ideas and write best practices - writing and brainstorming will people is an amazing way to deepen your Docker understanding.</p>
<p>At first, we want to collect ideas for best practices, solidify a list</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">

              </span>

              <div class="labels lh-condensed">

        <div class="px-3 pt-3">
          <p class="text-gray mb-0"><div>A professional front-end template for building fast, robust, and adaptable web apps or sites.</div></p>

<h3>Existing Component</h3>
<p>Yes</p>
<h3>Component Name</h3>
<p>el-scrollbar</p>
<h3>Description</h3>
<p>I'm trying to add a scrollbar to an aside menu with el-scrollbar componant but I have some difficulty due to missing entry in the documentation.<br>
My case is exactly the same as the documentation: a fixed header, a scrollable sidebar menu and a scro</p>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <div class="highlight highlight-source-js"><pre><span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">customizer</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">console</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">log</span> <span class="pl-c">// returns undefined =&gt; merging is handled by `mergeAllWith`</span>

<span class="pl-c">// good</span>
<span class="pl-en">mergeAll</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">[</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span> <span class="pl-c1">a</span>: <span class="pl-c1">1</span> <span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span> <span class="pl-c1">b</span>: <span class="pl-c1">2</span> <span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">]</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span> <span class="pl-c">// { a: 1, b: 2 }</span>
<span class="pl-en">mergeAllWith</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s1">customizer</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-kos">[</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span> <span class="pl-c1">a</span>: <span class="pl-c1">1</span> <span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span> <span class="pl-c1">b</span>: <span class="pl-c1">2</span> <span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">]</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span> <span class="pl-c">// { a: 1, b: 2 }</span>
<span class="pl-c">// A-OK; customizer logs the following:</span>
<span class="pl-c">// undefined 2 "b" Object { a: 1, b: 2 } Object { b: 2 } undefined</span>

<span class="pl-c">// bad</span>
<span class="pl-en">mergeAll</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span> <span class="pl-c1">a</span>: <span class="pl-c1">1</span> <span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span> <span class="pl-c1">b</span>: <span class="pl-c1">2</span> <span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span> <span class="pl-c">// { a: 1, b: 2 }; OU</span></pre></div>

                <relative-time datetime="2020-02-24T18:31:16Z" class="no-wrap">Feb 24, 2020</relative-time>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Some of the issues below are already mentioned in other tickets, but I have the feeling that a proper generic issue is due to give it visibility, as for now the current package is unusable for many users.</p>
<ol>
<li>The typescript package doesn't respect the tsconfig flags, and many of them are hardcoded inside the meteor/babel package.<br>
I understand that meteor needs to control some compilation option</li>
</ol>

      <article class="p-3">
        <div class="d-flex flex-justify-between mb-3">

feature request</p>
<p><strong>What is the current behavior?</strong><br>
Currently <code>yarn why</code> won't indicate any package info in the resolutions field</p>
<p><strong>If the current behavior is a bug, please provide the steps to reproduce.</strong></p>
<ol>
<li>install a package with any version, e.g <code>"pkg": "^1.0.0"</code></li>
<li>add <code>resolutions</code> field in package.json, <code>pkg: "1.0.0"</code></li>

      <div class="col-md-4 col-lg-3">
              <p class="mb-1">
      <span class="text-gray">Created by</span> Brendan Eich
    </p>

    <p class="mb-1">
      <span class="text-gray">Released</span> December 4, 1995
    </p>
